projects_main_page.description: Development of a software for a stock portfolio manager made using a stock market API and Clojure to learn the language and also functional programming
Project developed in Unity using C#, in collaboration with two other team members, for an educational game that teaches about various Brazilian biomes.
Front-end project to learn some concepts of HTML, CSS and Javascript

projects_secondary_page.title: Spotify Clone
projects_secondary_page.description: A front-end project for learning and improving HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills, where a copy of the Spotify web page was created as a study objective

projects_secondary_page.title: Sales Dashboard
projects_secondary_page.description: A sales control software project designed to track sales levels and other information, organized by month. Learnings included consolidating knowledge in jQuery and PHP, starting to use AJAX for asynchronous web page updates, and utilizing a database to fetch and display information on the page.
projects_secondary_page.tech: HTML, CSS, PHP, PhpMyAdmin, Javascript, JQuery and Bootstrap

projects_secondary_page.title: Stock portfolio
projects_secondary_page.description: Development of a software for a stock portfolio manager made using a stock market API and Clojure to learn the language and also functional programming

projects_secondary_page.title: Claws of destiny
projects_secondary_page.description: Project developed in Unity using C#, in collaboration with two other team members, for an educational game that teaches about various Brazilian biomes.

projects_secondary_page.title: Lexical Syntatic Analyser
projects_secondary_page.description: This project involves creating a Lexical and Syntactic Analyzer to process input strings into tokens and validate their syntactic structure based on a defined grammar. Key learnings include understanding lexical and syntactic analysis, implementing token classification, constructing parse trees, and handling errors gracefully

projects_secondary_page.title: Personal budget App
projects_secondary_page.description: A personal budgeting software project to test knowledge in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP). This project consolidated understanding and application of OOP principles.
